outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
The moss-covered statue responds to Thalion's harmonious melody. The moss parts, unveiling a hidden staircase beneath.

The statue, now animated, serves as a guide, revealing a path that descends into the heart of the ancient forest, beckoning the adventurers towards the concealed treasure.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Step down into the revealed path

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
Upon descending the moss-revealed staircase a serene underground chamber with a mystical pool at its center can be found. In the pool lies a crystalline key, resonating with the ancient symbols of the moss-covered guardian. The key, when retrieved, emits a gentle hum, echoing the completion of the quest.

Better head back to inform about this to [b][color=blue]Elder Gavric[/color][/b].
